name: hifiberry
text:
Enable HifiBerry sound card
Type: %1
%2 Disable built-in audio card
%3 Configure ALSA
Requires restart to take effect
shortDescription: Enable support for a HifiBerry sound card.
longDescription: HifiBerry make and sell several high quality audio cards for Raspberry Pi - this block enables them and gives you the option of disabling the Raspberry Pi's built in audio card to prevent any confusion between the two.
